Question.Subject: i have a playlist.com question?
Question.Content: how do you delete a question on this website? i don't need one anymore and i don't want it, so how do i delete it? i meant how do you delete a playlist??
Question.ChosenAnswer:
im confused... delete a question on playlist.com? not a clue! don't worry about a question on playlist, it will probably be ignored anyways
to delete a question on answer.yahoo.com go hover your mouse over the "save" button right under the question you posted and a list of things will appear, one says "delete question", click on it note: this only works for questions you deleted
